description.german: Du hast die Leiche vom Baum entfernt, ohne das Monster im See zu wecken.
description.italian: Hai rimosso il cadavere dall'albero senza allertare i mostri del lago.
description.russian: Вы сняли труп с дерева, не потревожив тварей в пруду.
description.schinese: 你将尸体从树上取下时未惊动湖中的怪物。
description.spanish: Has bajado el cadáver del árbol sin alertar a los monstruos del lago.

description.brazilian: Você venceu a batalha por Gundrun.
description.english: You won the battle for Gundrun.
description.french: Vous avez remporté la bataille pour Gundrun.
description.german: Du hast die Schlacht um Gundrun gewonnen.
description.italian: Hai vinto la battaglia per Gundrun.
description.russian: Вы отстояли Гундрун в бою.
description.schinese: 你在冈德峦之战中取胜。
description.spanish: Has ganado la batalla de Gundrun.

description.brazilian: Você concluiu a missão pessoal de Ulbrig.
description.english: You completed Ulbrig's personal quest.
description.french: Vous avez terminé la quête personnelle d'Ulbrig.
description.german: Du hast Ulbrigs persönliche Quest abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Hai completato la missione personale di Ulbrig.
description.russian: Вы завершили личный квест Ульбрига.
description.schinese: 你完成了乌布里格的个人任务。
description.spanish: Has completado la misión personal de Ulbrig.

description.brazilian: Você encontrou a estátua do grifo.
description.english: You found the griffon statue.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé la statue de griffon.
description.german: Du hast die Statue des Greifs gefunden.
description.italian: Hai trovato la statua del grifone.
description.russian: Вы нашли статую грифона.
description.schinese: 你找到了狮鹫雕像。
description.spanish: Has encontrado la estatua del grifo.

description.brazilian: Você conheceu uma divindade da antiga Sarkoris.
description.english: You met a deity of old Sarkoris.
description.french: Vous avez rencontré une déesse de l'ancien Sarkaris.
description.german: Du hast eine Gottheit des alten Sarkoris getroffen.
description.italian: Hai incontrato una divinità dell'antica Sarkoris.
description.russian: Вы встретились с божеством старого Саркориса.
description.schinese: 你遇到了旧萨阔力的一位神祇。
description.spanish: Has conocido a una diosa de la antigua Sarkoris.

description.brazilian: Você expôs o traidor.
description.english: You exposed a traitor.
description.french: Vous avez démasqué un traître.
description.german: Du hast einen Verräter entlarvt.
description.italian: Hai smascherato un traditore.
description.russian: Вы разоблачили предателя.
description.schinese: 你揭发了一个叛徒。
description.spanish: Has expuesto a un traidor.

description.brazilian: Você evitou uma luta contra os elementais em Currantglen.
description.english: You avoided a fight with the elementals in Currantglen.
description.french: Vous avez évité un combat contre les élémentaires à Currantglen.
description.german: Du hast einen Kampf mit den Elementaren in Currantglen vermieden.
description.italian: Hai evitato un combattimento con gli elementali a Currantglen.
description.russian: Вы избежали сражения с элементалями в Смородиновой пади.
description.schinese: 你在醋栗谷避免了与元素生物的战斗。
description.spanish: Has evitado tener que luchar con los elementales en Currantglen.

description.brazilian: Você e Ulbrig encontraram o que sobrou dos grifos.
description.english: You and Ulbrig found all that remains of the griffons.
description.french: Ulbrig et vous avez trouvé tous les vestiges des griffons.
description.german: Du hast mit Ulbrig alles gefunden, was von den Greifen geblieben ist.
description.italian: Tu e Ulbrig avete trovato tutto ciò che resta dei grifoni.
description.russian: Вы с Ульбригом нашли все останки грифонов.
description.schinese: 你和乌布里格发现了狮鹫仅存的痕迹。
description.spanish: Ulbrig y tú habéis encontrado lo que queda de los grifos.

description.brazilian: Você orquestrou a destruição de um dos cristais.
description.english: You disposed of one of the shards.
description.french: Vous avez orchestré la destruction de l'un des cristaux.
description.german: Du hast einen der Splitter beseitigt.
description.italian: Hai eliminato uno dei frammenti.
description.russian: Вы избавились от одного из осколков.
description.schinese: 你舍弃了碎片中的一块。
description.spanish: Te has deshecho de uno de los fragmentos.

description.brazilian: Você encontrou um fragmento perdido na floresta.
description.english: You found a shard lost in the woods.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé le cristal perdu dans les bois.
description.german: Du hast in den Wäldern einen verlorenen Splitter gefunden.
description.italian: Hai trovato un frammento perso nel bosco.
description.russian: Вы нашли осколок, затерянный в лесу.
description.schinese: 你找到了遗失在树林中的碎片。
description.spanish: Has encontrado el fragmento perdido en el bosque.

description.brazilian: Você saqueou o tesouro de um dragão.
description.english: You helped yourself to a dragon's hoard.
description.french: Vous avez mis la main sur le trésor d'un dragon.
description.german: Du hast einen Drachenhort an dich gebracht.
description.italian: Vi siete accaparrati il bottino di un drago.
description.russian: Вы запустили руки в сокровищницу дракона.
description.schinese: 一头巨龙的宝藏任你取用。
description.spanish: Has saqueado el tesoro de un dragón.

description.brazilian: Você derrotou a Escuridão Encadeada na dificuldade Principal ou superior.
description.english: You defeated Chained Darkness on Core difficulty or above.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu les Ténèbres enchaînées en mode Principal ou plus difficile encore.
description.german: Du hast Gekettete Dunkelheit auf Kern-Schwierigkeit oder höher besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Oscurità Incatenata giocando a difficoltà Cruciale o superiore.
description.russian: Вы победили Закованную тьму на сложности Суровая или выше.
description.schinese: 以核心或更高难度击败受缚的黑暗。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la Oscuridad Encadenada en dificultad Estricto o superior.

description.brazilian: Você encontrou o esconderijo do cultista morto.
description.english: You found the dead cultist's stash.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé la cache du fanatique mort.
description.german: Du hast das Lager des toten Kultisten gefunden.
description.italian: Hai trovato la scorta del cultista morto.
description.russian: Вы нашли тайник мертвого культиста.
description.schinese: 你找到了死去邪教徒的藏物处。
description.spanish: Has encontrado el alijo del sectario muerto.

displayName.french: Je me demande ce qu'elles contiennent

description.brazilian: Você abriu todas as donzelas de ferro do Mundo das Sombras.
description.english: You opened every iron maiden in the Shadow World.
description.french: Vous avez ouvert toutes les vierges de fer du monde des ombres.
description.german: Du hast alle Eisernen Jungfrauen in der Schattenwelt geöffnet.
description.italian: Hai aperto ogni vergine di ferro nel Mondo delle Ombre.
description.russian: Вы открыли всех железных дев в мире теней.
description.schinese: 你打开了影界的所有铁处女。
description.spanish: Has abierto todas las doncellas de hierro del mundo de las sombras.

description.brazilian: Você conseguiu passar despercebido por todas as patrulhas das sombras.
description.english: You managed to sneak past all the shadow patrols.
description.french: Vous avez fait preuve de discrétion en échappant à toutes les patrouilles des ombres.
description.german: Du hast dich an allen Schattenpatrouillen vorbeigeschlichen.
description.italian: Hai superato di nascosto tutte le pattuglie dell'Ombra.
description.russian: Вы незаметно проскользнули мимо всех теневых патрулей.
description.schinese: 你成功躲过了所有幽影巡逻队。
description.spanish: Has burlado todas las patrullas de sombras.

description.brazilian: Você leu todas as anotações deixadas pelo prisioneiro das sombras.
description.english: You read all the notes left by the prisoner of shadows.
description.french: Vous avez lu toutes les notes laissées par la prisonnière des ombres.
description.german: Du hast alle Notizen des Gefangenen der Schatten gelesen.
description.italian: Hai letto tutti gli appunti lasciati dal prigioniero delle ombre.
description.russian: Вы прочли все записи узника теней.
description.schinese: 你阅读了幽影的囚犯所留下的所有笔记。
description.spanish: Has leído todas las notas del prisionero de las sombras.

description.brazilian: Você realizou seu maior feito.
description.english: You performed your greatest feat.
description.french: Vous avez accompli votre plus grand exploit.
description.german: Du hast deine größte Tat vollbracht.
description.italian: Hai compiuto la tua più grande impresa.
description.russian: Вы совершили свой величайший подвиг.
description.schinese: 你实现了最辉煌的壮举。
description.spanish: Has realizado tu mayor hazaña.

description.brazilian: Você presenciou a maior façanha de Sendri.
description.english: You witnessed Sendri's greatest feat.
description.french: Vous avez assisté au plus grand exploit de Sendri.
description.german: Du hast Sendris größte Tat mit eigenen Augen gesehen.
description.italian: Hai assistito alla più grande impresa di Sendri.
description.russian: Вы увидели величайший подвиг Сендри.
description.schinese: 你见证了森德里最辉煌的壮举。
description.spanish: Has presenciado la mayor hazaña de Sendri.

description.brazilian: Você presenciou a maior façanha de Rekarth.
description.english: You witnessed Rekarth's greatest feat.
description.french: Vous avez assisté au plus grand exploit de Rekarth.
description.german: Du hast Rekarths größte Tat mit eigenen Augen gesehen.
description.italian: Hai assistito alla più grande impresa di Rekarth.
description.russian: Вы увидели величайший подвиг Рекарта.
description.schinese: 你见证了雷卡斯最辉煌的壮举。
description.spanish: Has presenciado la mayor hazaña de Rekarth.

description.brazilian: Você presenciou a maior façanha de Penta.
description.english: You witnessed Penta's greatest feat.
description.french: Vous avez assisté au plus grand exploit de Penta.
description.german: Du hast Pentas größte Tat mit eigenen Augen gesehen.
description.italian: Hai assistito alla più grande impresa di Penta.
description.russian: Вы увидели величайший подвиг Пенты.
description.schinese: 你见证了五最辉煌的壮举。
description.spanish: Has presenciado la mayor hazaña de Penta.

description.brazilian: Você obteve o fragmento escondido sob a terra.
description.english: You obtained the shard hidden underground.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé le cristal caché sous terre.
description.german: Du hast den im Untergrund verborgenen Splitter geborgen.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il frammento nascosto nel sottosuolo.
description.russian: Вы нашли осколок, спрятанный под землей.
description.schinese: 你获得了藏在地底的碎片。
description.spanish: Has encontrado el fragmento escondido bajo tierra.

description.brazilian: Você encontrou o fragmento escondido entre várias curiosidades mágicas.
description.english: You found the shard hidden amongst various magical curiosities.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé le cristal caché parmi divers bibelots magiques.
description.german: Du hast den zwischen magischen Seltsamkeiten versteckten Splitter gefunden.
description.italian: Hai trovato il frammento nascosto in mezzo a varie stranezze magiche.
description.russian: Вы нашли осколок среди всевозможных магических диковин.
description.schinese: 你找到了藏在各种魔法奇物之中的碎片。
description.spanish: Has encontrado el fragmento escondido entre diversas curiosidades mágicas.

description.brazilian: Você obteve o fragmento de uma coleção particular.
description.english: You obtained a shard from a private collection.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré le cristal appartenant à une collection privée.
description.german: Du hast einen Splitter aus einer Privatsammlung erhalten.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto un frammento da una collezione privata.
description.russian: Вы нашли осколок из частной коллекции.
description.schinese: 你从私人藏品中获得了一块碎片。
description.spanish: Has conseguido el fragmento de una colección privada.

description.brazilian: Você derrotou Sithhud após enfraquecê-lo.
description.english: You defeated Sithhud after first weakening him.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Sithhud après avoir commencé par l'affaiblir.
description.german: Du hast Sithhud geschwächt und dann besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Sithhud dopo averlo prima indebolito.
description.russian: Вы победили Ситхада, предварительно ослабив его.
description.schinese: 你先削弱了希斯诃德的实力，之后将其击败。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Sithhud tras debilitarlo.

description.brazilian: Você derrotou Sithhud no auge de seu poder.
description.english: You defeated Sithhud at the height of his power.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Sithhud alors qu'il était au faîte de sa puissance.
description.german: Du hast Sithhud auf dem Höhepunkt seiner Macht besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Sithhud all'apice della sua potenza.
description.russian: Вы победили Ситхада на пике его силы.
description.schinese: 你击败了发挥出全部实力的希斯诃德。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Sithhud en su momento álgido.

description.brazilian: Você derrotou o Zelador.
description.english: You defeated the Caretaker.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu l'Auxiliaire.
description.german: Du hast den Verwalter besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Custode.
description.russian: Вы победили Смотрителя.
description.schinese: 你击败了看门人。
description.spanish: Has derrotado al Cuidador.

description.brazilian: Você coletou todos os fragmentos.
description.english: You collected every shard.
description.french: Vous avez récupéré tous les cristaux.
description.german: Du hast alle Splitter gesammelt.
description.italian: Hai collezionato tutti i frammenti.
description.russian: Вы собрали все осколки.
description.schinese: 你集齐了所有碎片。
description.spanish: Has conseguido todos los fragmentos.

description.brazilian: Você derrotou o elemental de cerveja.
description.english: You defeated the beer elemental.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu l'élémentaire de bière.
description.german: Du hast das Bierelementar besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto l'elementale della birra.
description.russian: Вы победили пивного элементаля.
description.schinese: 你击败了啤酒元素。
description.spanish: Has derrotado al elemental de cerveza.

displayName.spanish: Dolor y placer: partes de un todo

description.brazilian: Você fez um movimento em um jogo de tabuleiro bastante peculiar.
description.english: You made a move on a peculiar game board.
description.french: Vous avez joué un coup sur un jeu de plateau assez particulier.
description.german: Du hast einen Zug auf einem seltsamen Spielbrett gemacht.
description.italian: Hai fatto una mossa su un tavolo da gioco particolare.
description.russian: Вы сделали ход на необычной игровой доске.
description.schinese: 你在一个奇特的棋盘上走了一步棋。
description.spanish: Has hecho tu jugada en un tablero muy peculiar.

description.brazilian: Você derrotou Sithhud na dificuldade Injusto.
description.english: You defeated Sithhud on Unfair difficulty.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Sithhud en mode Injuste.
description.german: Du hast Sithhud auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad "Unfair" besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Sithhud a difficoltà Ingiusta.
description.russian: Вы победили Ситхада на Нечестной сложности.
description.schinese: 在不公平难度中击败希斯诃德。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Sithhud en dificultad Injusta.

description.brazilian: Você permaneceu disfarçado durante todo o festival.
description.english: You remained incognito for the whole festival.
description.french: Vous avez gardé l'anonymat pendant toute la durée du festival.
description.german: Du warst während des gesamten Festivals incognito.
description.italian: Sei rimasto in incognito per tutto il festival.
description.russian: Вы оставались инкогнито на протяжение всего праздника.
description.schinese: 你在整场节庆期间一直隐藏身份。
description.spanish: Has permanecido de incógnito todo el festival.

displayName.french: Tel est pris qui croyait prendre

description.brazilian: Você desmascarou o espião sozinho.
description.english: You uncovered the spy on your own.
description.french: Vous avez démasqué l'espion vous-même.
description.german: Du hast den Spion selbst enttarnt.
description.italian: Hai scoperto la spia da solo.
description.russian: Вы самостоятельно раскрыли следующего за вами шпиона.
description.schinese: 你靠自己发现了间谍。
description.spanish: Has descubierto al espía por tu cuenta.

description.brazilian: Você venceu o torneio na arena do Eco da Fúria.
description.english: You won the tournament at the Echo of Fury arena.
description.french: Vous avez remporté le tournoi de l'arène des Échos de la Fureur.
description.german: Du hast das Turnier in der Echo der Wut-Arena gewonnen.
description.italian: Hai vinto il torneo nell'arena dell'Eco della Furia.
description.russian: Вы победили на турнире арены Эхо ярости.
description.schinese: 你赢得了怒火回响竞技场的比赛。
description.spanish: Has ganado el torneo de la arena Eco de la Furia.

description.brazilian: Você frustrou os planos de Razmir.
description.english: You foiled Razmir's plans.
description.french: Vous avez déjoué les plans de Razmir.
description.german: Du hast Razmirs Pläne durchkreuzt.
description.italian: Hai sventato i piani di Razmir.
description.russian: Вы сорвали планы Размира.
description.schinese: 你挫败了拉兹米尔的阴谋。
description.spanish: Has frustrado los planes de Razmir.

description.brazilian: Você aproveitou o festival com pelo menos dez de seus companheiros.
description.english: You hung out at the festival with at least ten of your companions.
description.french: Vous avez passé du temps avec au moins 10 de vos compagnons au festival.
description.german: Du hat das Festival mit mindestens zehn deiner Gefährten verbracht.
description.italian: Hai partecipato al festival con almeno dieci dei tuoi compagni.
description.russian: Вы повеселились на празднике с десятью из ваших спутников.
description.schinese: 你跟至少十名同伴一起参加了节庆。
description.spanish: Has disfrutado del festival con al menos diez de tus compañeros.

description.brazilian: Você teve um encontro muito especial que terminou com um beijo.
description.english: You had an extra special date that ended with a kiss.
description.french: Vous avez vécu un moment romantique spécial qui s'est conclu sur un baiser.
description.german: Du hattest eine besondere Verabredung, die mit einem Kuss endete.
description.italian: Hai avuto un appuntamento speciale che si è concluso con un bacio.
description.russian: У вас было особенное свидание, закончившееся поцелуем.
description.schinese: 你享受了一场特别的约会，并以接吻落幕。
description.spanish: Has tenido una cita muy especial que ha terminado en beso.

description.brazilian: Você derrotou Aslynn na arena do Eco da Fúria.
description.english: You defeated Aslynn at the Echo of Fury arena.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Aslynn dans l'arène des Échos de la Fureur.
description.german: Du hast Aslynn in der Echo des Zorns-Arena besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Aslynn nell'arena dell'Eco della Furia.
description.russian: Вы победили Аслинн на арене Эхо ярости.
description.schinese: 你在怒火回响竞技场内击败了阿斯琳。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Aslynn en la arena Eco de la Furia.

description.brazilian: Você derrotou A Oposição na arena do Eco da Fúria.
description.english: You defeated The Opposites at the Echo of Fury arena.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu l'Opposition dans l'arène des Échos de la Fureur.
description.german: Du hast die Gegensätze in der Echo der Wut-Arena besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto gli Oppositori nell'arena dell'Eco della Furia.
description.russian: Вы победили Противоположности на арене Эхо ярости.
description.schinese: 你击败了怒火回响竞技场里的敌手。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Los Opuestos en la arena Eco de la Furia.

displayName.french: À la poursuite de la gloire

description.brazilian: Você derrotou Drimo na arena do Eco da Fúria.
description.english: You defeated Drimo at the Echo of Fury arena.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Drimo dans l'arène des Échos de la Fureur.
description.german: Du hast Drimo in der Echo der Wut-Arena besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Drimo nell'arena dell'Eco della Furia.
description.russian: Вы победили Дримо на арене Эхо ярости.
description.schinese: 你在怒火回响竞技场内击败了德利莫。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Drimo en la arena Eco de la Furia.

description.brazilian: Você aproveitou o festival de Kenabres como o Enxame que Caminha.
description.english: You enjoyed the Kenabres festival as the Swarm That Walks.
description.french: Vous avez profité du festival de Kénabres en tant que nuée ambulante.
description.german: Du hast das Festival in Kenabres als Wandelnder Schwarm genossen!
description.italian: Hai partecipato al festival di Kenabres come Sciame che Cammina.
description.russian: Вы насладились праздником в качества шагающего роя.
description.schinese: 你以虫群行者的身份出席坎娜布利的节庆。
description.spanish: Has disfrutado del festival de Kenabres como enjambre que camina.
